Dear children, we feel an interest for you. We hope you will not neglect your spiritual interest. "Therefore we ought to give the more earnest heed to the things which we have heard, lest at any time we should let them slip (marginal reading: "Or, run out as leaking vessels"), for if the word spoken by angels was stedfast, and every transgression and disobedience received a just recompense of reward; how shall 


                                     -333- 

we escape, if we neglect so great salvation?" (Hebrews 2:1-3).
